New Records: CJ McCollum delivered 50 points in one of the greatest offensive performances in Pelicans history.
McCollum produced the fifth game of 50-plus points in 23 seasons of New Orleans basketball.
Key Match Events: CJ McCollum scored 50 points, including 10 three-point baskets in 16 attempts.
The Pelicans won 132-120 over the Wizards.
McCollum's performance helped end an 11-game losing streak for New Orleans.
Pre-Game Insights: CJ McCollum entered the game at 34 percent from beyond the arc this season.
Post-Match Reflections: Pelicans forward Trey Murphy expressed excitement over McCollum's performance, stating it was like watching the CJ McCollum he saw playing when he was in elementary school.
Head coach Willie Green praised McCollum's performance, noting the variety and difficulty of the shots he made.
McCollum reflected on his hard work and dedication, mentioning his motivation from his family.
